Overview.name: Overview0
Overview.content: Background topics do not explain a special feature or API. They explain how OpenCms is designed. These topics may be good to read for administrators or template developers. Read them to get a "feeling" on how OpenCms works.

Teaser.name: Teaser0
Teaser.content: Backgroud topics explain design concepts of OpenCms. Read them to get a "feeling" for OpenCms.
